title: Doctor Foster Comes Back for One Last Show
summary: A TV show called Doctor Foster is coming back for a third and final season. The actress Suranne Jones plays Gemma Foster, a doctor who is getting married and trying to start fresh. But old problems from her past might ruin her happiness. The show is about Gemma dealing with secrets and trying to move on. It first aired in 2015 and many people watched it. The new episodes will start filming soon in Hertfordshire, and the writer Mike Bartlett is helping make it. Fans are excited to see how Gemma's story ends.
